2. 'Good Kill' (2014) - A thought-provoking drama about a drone pilot questioning the ethics of his job, starring Bruce Greenwood and Zoë Kravitz.

conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: What kind of story does Her tell? I can’t decide if I’d enjoy it or be scared by it.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Given your preference for 19th century settings, English language films, and a story that isn't likely to scare you, I recommend considering "Burn After Reading" (2008). This Coen Brothers comedy features an all-star cast, including George Clooney, Brad Pitt, and John Malkovich. The plot revolves around a disk containing mysterious information, which ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous gym employees who attempt to sell it for their own benefit. Enjoy!
